name: Silent Descent
description: Silent Decent is a highly-immersive first-person horror game with a rich and engaging atmosphere. Trapped in purgatory, you play as Samuel Harris who roams in an endless loop of anguish, pain and suffering. Can you find a way to save a tormented man's soul?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: Intel i5 Memory: 6 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 680 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 6 GB available space Sound Card: Compatible Sound Card
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel i7 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 950 DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 6 GB available space Sound Card: Compatible Sound Card
